gw.cc.financials.entity

Interface RecoverySearchCriteria

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public interface RecoverySearchCriteria
extends java.io.Serializable
    Criteria object used to search for Recovery entities in the local database.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean displaySingleCurrencyWarning()
      Tests whether a warning should be displayed to indicated that the search criteria have been set to only search for recoveries of a particular currency.
      Currency getCurrencyForLastSearch()
      Gets the currency for the last search.
      CurrencyAmount getSum()
      Deprecated. 
      use a footerSumValue bound to RecoverySearchView.Amount instead
      IQueryResult<? extends Bean,QueryRow> getSummaryRow()
      Deprecated. 
      use the query result returned by performSearch instead, which includes the summary query
      boolean isShowSumRow()
      Deprecated. 
      use isShowSumRowForLastSearch() instead
      boolean isShowSumRowForLastSearch()
      Tests whether the sum row should be displayed.
      IQueryBeanResult<RecoverySearchView> performSearch()
      Constructs the appropriate query based on the specified criteria.

    • Method Detail

      • getSummaryRow

        IQueryResult<? extends Bean,QueryRow> getSummaryRow()
        Deprecated. use the query result returned by performSearch instead, which includes the summary query
        Runs a query that sums up the columns of the search results, for use in the SummaryRow on screen. This is done in the database, which is faster than retrieving all the found Checks and adding up their columns.
        Returns:
        a QueryProcessor with one row of sums

      • getSum

        CurrencyAmount getSum()
        Deprecated. use a footerSumValue bound to RecoverySearchView.Amount instead
        Runs a query that sums up the columns of the search result and returns the summed amount, as a CurrencyAmount object, for use in the SummaryRow on screen. This aggregation is done in the database, which is much faster than retrieving all the found checks and adding up their amount values.
        Returns:
        a CurrencyAmount containing the computed sum

      • performSearch

        IQueryBeanResult<RecoverySearchView> performSearch()
        Constructs the appropriate query based on the specified criteria. The returned query includes the appropriate summary row.
        Returns:
        Recovery query results including a summary row, based on the specified criteria, as RecoverySearchView objects

      • displaySingleCurrencyWarning

        boolean displaySingleCurrencyWarning()
        Tests whether a warning should be displayed to indicated that the search criteria have been set to only search for recoveries of a particular currency. In a single-currency configuration this method always returns false.
        Returns:
        true if this is a multicurrency configuration and only recoveries of a single currency are being searched for, else false

      • isShowSumRowForLastSearch

        boolean isShowSumRowForLastSearch()
        Tests whether the sum row should be displayed. Returns true if in single currency mode or the previous search was against a specific currency.
        Returns:
        true if in single currency mode or the previous search was against a specific currency

      • getCurrencyForLastSearch

        Currency getCurrencyForLastSearch()
        Gets the currency for the last search.
        Returns:
        the currency used to perform the last search, or null if none

      • isShowSumRow

        boolean isShowSumRow()
        Deprecated. use isShowSumRowForLastSearch() instead
        Tests whether the sum row should be displayed. This depends on whether the last performed search was done for a specific currency.
        Returns:
        true if the sum row should be displayed, else true
